short_summary: Request for Industry feedback to define the requirements for an upcoming Request for Proposal (RFP)
description: Request for information for Information Services and Bibliographic Database Access
full_summary:
=================================
### Request for Information (RFI) for Information Services and Bibliographic Database Access

#### Solicitation Details

| Solicitation Number | Publication Date | Closing Date | Amendment Number |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 100026659 | June 17, 2024 | July 4, 2024, 14:00:00 | 1 |

#### Notice Type and Method

* Notice Type: Request for Information (RFI)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Contracting Entity and End User

* Contracting Entity: Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)
* End User Entities: None

#### Solicitation Type and Category

* Notice Type: Request for Information (RFI)
* Procurement Category: Services (SRV)

#### Selection Criteria and Trade Agreements

* Selection Criteria: Not Applicable
* Trade Agreements: None

#### Tender Status

* Tender Status: Expired

#### Region of Opportunity and Delivery

* Region of Opportunity: Canada
* Region of Delivery: Canada

#### Solicitation Documents

* RFI Document: [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40292/ddr-bibliodatabases-100026659_0.pdf) [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40292/rfi-bibliodatabases-100026659.pdf)

#### Contact Information

* Contact Person: Patrick Blais
* Email: nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
* Phone: (000) 000-0000

#### Industry Feedback and Requirements

Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking feedback from the industry to assist in defining the requirements for an upcoming Request for Proposal (RFP). The RFI's objectives are to inform potential suppliers of the basic procurement requirements and collect information on the level of interest and capability from Canadian suppliers. The RFI solicits industry feedback on the requirements as published in this document. 

Please note that the RFI's objectives and scope are subject to change. 

Address any inquiries to Patrick Blais at nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca. 

All responses must be submitted in English or French. 

No responses will be accepted after the deadline. 

Note that the fundraiser has been thru. 


Note - I removed a lot mere contacts and replies at the end
